DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomized double-blind study on the effect of prebiotics (inulin and fructo-oligosaccharides) in the prevention of antibiotic-associated diarrhea in children.
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Childhood Antibiotic-associated Diarrhea by Prebiotics
DOC.detailed_description: Group will get either the product or placebo blindly throughout antibiotic treatment with additional 14 days.
DOC.criteria: Healthy children with acute infection. Hypersensitivity to antibiotics, chronic illness.
